title: My Google Pixel Talk Back turns itself on, by itself? Is this a Bug?
content:
My Google Pixel turns itself on, by itself!  Can you tell me how this happens & why this might happen?  It keeps telling me to DOUBLE TAP, & TALK BACK,  becomes a bit annoying because I can't remember how to shut it off!  

I am using a Google Pixel 1!  

I was outside when this happened, & the Air Force was flying over me!  Is the US Air Force hacking my phone?
